member.name: M:Dextra.Marvel.Api.V1.Controllers.CharacterController.GetCharacterById(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiVersion,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method fetches a single character resource. It is the canonical URI for any character resource provided by the API.
member.param: API version. It`s automatically populated if using URL versioning.
